11 OdomTracker::OdomTracker()
12 {
13  workingMode_ = WorkingMode::RECORD_PATH_FORWARD;
14  publishMessages = true;
15  subscribeToOdometryTopic_ = true;
16 }
17 
23 void OdomTracker::init(ros::NodeHandle& nh)
24 {
25  ROS_WARN("Initializing Odometry Tracker");
26 
27  if(!nh.getParam("min_point_distance_forward_thresh",minPointDistanceForwardThresh_))
28  {
29  minPointDistanceForwardThresh_ = 0.005; // 1 mm
30  }
31 
32  if(!nh.getParam("min_point_distance_backward_thresh",minPointDistanceBackwardThresh_))
33  {
34  minPointDistanceBackwardThresh_ = 0.05; // 1 mm
35  }
36 
37  if(!nh.getParam("min_point_angular_distance_forward_thresh",minPointAngularDistanceForwardThresh_))
38  {
39  minPointAngularDistanceForwardThresh_ = 0.15 ; // degree
40  }
41 
42  if(!nh.getParam("min_point_angular_distance_backward_thresh",minPointAngularDistanceBackwardThresh_))
43  {
44  minPointAngularDistanceBackwardThresh_ = 0.15 ; // degree
45  }
46 
47  if(this->subscribeToOdometryTopic_)
48  {
49  odomSub_= nh.subscribe("odom", 1, &OdomTracker::processOdometryMessage, this);
50  }
51 
52  robotBasePathPub_ = std::make_shared<realtime_tools::RealtimePublisher<nav_msgs::Path>>(nh, "odom_tracker_path", 1);
53 }
54 
55 
61 void OdomTracker::setWorkingMode(WorkingMode workingMode)
62 {
63  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex acquire");
64  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
65  workingMode_ = workingMode;
66  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex release");
67 }
68 
74 void OdomTracker::setPublishMessages(bool value)
75 {
76  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex acquire");
77  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
78  publishMessages = value;
79  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex release");
80 }
81 
82 void OdomTracker::pushPath()
83 {
84  ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex acquire");
85  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
86  pathStack_.push_back(baseTrajectory_);
87  baseTrajectory_.poses.clear();
88  ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex release");
89 }
90 
91 void OdomTracker::popPath()
92 {
93  ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex acquire");
94  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
95 
96  if(!pathStack_.empty())
97  {
98  baseTrajectory_.poses = pathStack_.back().poses;
99  pathStack_.pop_back();
100  }
101 
102  ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex release");
103 }
104 
105 void OdomTracker::clearPath()
106 {
107  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
108  baseTrajectory_.poses.clear();
109 
110  rtPublishPaths(ros::Time::now());
111 }
112 
113 void OdomTracker::setStartPoint(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pose)
114 {
115  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
116  if(baseTrajectory_.poses.size() >0)
117  {
118  baseTrajectory_.poses[0]=pose;
119  }
120  else
121  {
122  baseTrajectory_.poses.push_back(pose);
123  }
124 }
125 
126 nav_msgs::Path OdomTracker::getPath()
127 {
128  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
129  return this->baseTrajectory_;
130 }
131 
137 void OdomTracker::rtPublishPaths(ros::Time timestamp)
138 {
139  if(robotBasePathPub_->trylock())
140  {
141  nav_msgs::Path& msg = robotBasePathPub_->msg_;
143 
144  msg = baseTrajectory_;
145  msg.header.stamp = timestamp;
146  robotBasePathPub_->unlockAndPublish();
147  }
148 }
149 
155 bool OdomTracker::updateBackward(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odom)
156 {
157  // we initially accept any message if the queue is empty
159  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped base_pose;
160 
161  base_pose.pose = odom.pose.pose;
162  base_pose.header = odom.header;
163  baseTrajectory_.header = odom.header;
164 
165  bool acceptBackward = false;
166  bool pullingerror = false;
167  if(baseTrajectory_.poses.empty())
168  {
169  acceptBackward=false;
170  }
171  else
172  {
173  const geometry_msgs::Point& prevPoint = baseTrajectory_.poses.back().pose.position;
174  const geometry_msgs::Point& currePoint = base_pose.pose.position;
175  double lastpointdist = p2pDistance(prevPoint, currePoint);
176 
177  acceptBackward = !baseTrajectory_.poses.empty()
178  && lastpointdist < minPointDistanceBackwardThresh_;
179 
180  pullingerror = lastpointdist > 2 * minPointDistanceBackwardThresh_;
181  }
182 
183  //ROS_INFO("Backwards, last distance: %lf < %lf accept: %d", dist, minPointDistanceBackwardThresh_, acceptBackward);
184  if (acceptBackward)
185  {
186  baseTrajectory_.poses.pop_back();
187  }
188  else if (pullingerror) {
189  ROS_WARN("Incorrect backwards motion. The robot is pulling the cord.");
190  }
191  else
192  {
194  }
195 
196  return acceptBackward;
197 }
203 bool OdomTracker::updateForward(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odom)
204 {
206  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped base_pose;
207 
208  base_pose.pose = odom.pose.pose;
209  base_pose.header = odom.header;
210  baseTrajectory_.header = odom.header;
211 
212  bool enqueueOdomMessage = false;
213 
214  double dist = -1;
215  if(baseTrajectory_.poses.empty())
216  {
217  enqueueOdomMessage = true;
218  }
219  else
220  {
221  const geometry_msgs::Point& prevPoint = baseTrajectory_.poses.back().pose.position;
222  const geometry_msgs::Point& currePoint = base_pose.pose.position;
223  dist = p2pDistance(prevPoint, currePoint);
224  //ROS_WARN("dist %lf vs min %lf", dist, minPointDistanceForwardThresh_);
225 
226  if(dist > minPointDistanceForwardThresh_)
227  {
228  enqueueOdomMessage = true;
229  }
230  else
231  {
232  //ROS_WARN("skip odom, dist: %lf", dist);
233  enqueueOdomMessage = false;
234  }
235  }
236 
237  if(enqueueOdomMessage)
238  {
239  baseTrajectory_.poses.push_back(base_pose);
240  }
241 
242  return enqueueOdomMessage;
243 }
244 
250 void OdomTracker::processOdometryMessage(const nav_msgs::Odometry& odom)
251 {
252  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex acquire");
253  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
254 
255  if(workingMode_ == WorkingMode::RECORD_PATH_FORWARD)
256  {
257  updateForward(odom);
258  }
259  else if (workingMode_ == WorkingMode::CLEAR_PATH_BACKWARD)
260  {
261  updateBackward(odom);
262  }
263 
264  //ROS_WARN("odomTracker odometry callback");
265  if(publishMessages)
266  {
267  rtPublishPaths(odom.header.stamp);
268  }
269 
270  //ROS_INFO("odom_tracker m_mutex release");
271 }
272 }
